title: JDK24 jdk_vector_1_FAILED jdk/incubator/vector/Float64VectorTests.java NPE at java.base/jdk.internal.vm.vector.VectorSupport.wrapShuffleIndexes(VectorSupport.java:284)
body:
Failure link
------------

From [an internal build](https://hyc-runtimes-jenkins.swg-devops.com/job/Test_openjdknext_j9_extended.openjdk_aarch64_linux_Personal/29/consoleFull)(`ubu22-aarch64-5`):

16:23:10  Eclipse OpenJ9 VM (build master-24c86c0ca8b, JRE 24 Linux aarch64-64-Bit Compressed References 20241106_129 (JIT enabled, AOT enabled)
16:23:10  OpenJ9   - 24c86c0ca8b
16:23:10  OMR      - 6fa180614ec

The test times out when running with -Xint, but the above symptoms suggest a potential JIT issue. @hzongaro Could the JIT team investigate this?
